name: Tofazzal Hossain Bhuiyan
title: Country Manager
subtitle: Experienced Executive & Business Leader
description: An experienced executive with 23+ years at Servier, demonstrating expertise in developing multinational organizations from launch. Skilled in comprehensive company management from business planning to operations, financial planning to decision making, HR management to legal contracts. A unique mix of domestic and global exposure with passion for change and excellence.
highlights: MBA in Human Resources & General Management
